name: NoMo-CMS
tagline: A straight forward Nodejs and MongoDB CMS
body:
### Welcome to NoMo CMS.
Contrary to it's name, this doesn't encourage no more CMS' ...rather it's a simple CMS based on Nodejs and MongoDB. The intention here was to create something usable right off the shelf, which also includes a helpful bag of tricks commonly required by every project:

* Basic-authentication
* Mobile/useragent detection
* Mongodb CRUD
* Dynamic templating
* Route separation
* Static file serving 

There are some other helpful libs baked in like angularjs, twitter bootstrap, and karma for end to end testing; however, these are easily replaced and/or removed. Feel free to clone and modify for your own purposes:

```
$ cd /your_repo_name
$ git clone git://github.com/martenc/nomo-cms.git
```

### Authors and Contributors
Just myself at the moment, Marten (@martenc).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with something? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/martenc/nomo-cms/wiki or create an issue at: https://github.com/martenc/nomo-cms/issues
